articles.title: Apple Reinstates Epic Games EU Developer Account, Paving the Way for Alternative App Store - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple today reversed a decision to shut down Epic Games' developer account in the European Union, and the account has now been reinstated. In a...
articles.content: Apple today reversed a decision to shut down Epic Games' developer account in the European Union, and the account has now been reinstated. In a statement to MacRumors, Apple said that Epic Games has … [+3807 chars]
